statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={3.4} , \displaystyle{b}={6.5}, \displaystyle{c}={8.8}, and \displaystyle{d}={10.5}, with diagonal length \displaystyle{e}={8.4} from the intersection of a and d to the intersection of b and c . Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
